channel.title: Lawscape V3. The rebirth
channel.description:
[center][b][size=23pt]Lawscape, The Rebirth[/size][/b] Coming soon.[/center]
[center]Lawscape has been a great server in the past. Mabye not as great as other servers, but good. The server has been shutdown for months, shortly after V2 the thunder. It was a miserable creation, laggy, unable to log in. Now, The improved lawscape, made from the ground up, has made some extensive improvements(see below). A client has been created for maximum performance. A whole new server engine will make this server [u]lagless[/u], and very [u]customizable.[/u] Many Minigames such as [b]full[/b] castlewars, ship engagement, and soon, pest control. All suggestions will be considered. All the work done to this server is done by me only. Nobody else has done anything to the server but me. No tutorials either, except mabye for a few of Xerocheez tuts, but thats about it. All the other tuts are shit(that are not client tuts) The base which is uberly modified, is hybridscape, which has been created by Miss SilabSoft.[/center]
[b]NOTE: Before you try going on, the server will only let admins or mods. Otherwise you will get a "members only" error.[/b] Major Improvements made already: - Perfect Magic - Perfect Mining and smithing. - Almost all skills working - Quests and Cutscenes - Improved shop system - Improved Player Handler - Improved Npc Handler - Improved Ban handler - Whole new server engine, supports lawscape and mopar clients. - No lag - Friends list fixed for Moparscape, and Lawscape client. - New Religion skill. - Prayer totally uberfied - Fletching exactly like runescape - Combat fighting Improved - Bank PINS - Hell and Heaven - Music - Clan interface - Most (If not all) bugs fixed - Webclient (http://lawscape.no-ip.org/playlawscape.html) - Economy
Major Improvements being made: - Many more minigames - Cracking cache - Editing cache - Repacking cache - Whole new client engine - Player suggestions quota to be filled - All skills working
[center]Many many more updates will be made to this server, and client. The only bad thing is.. You got to wait so long! I know, I'm a slow Java programmer. I like to make everything PERFECT.[/center]

item.title: Lawscape V3. The rebirth
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

Wow, looks really good but how do you play if only mods and admins can log on…? o.0

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Lawscape V3. The rebirth
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[center][size=23pt]Lawscape, The Rebirth[/size]
Coming soon.[/center]

[center]Lawscape has been a great server in the past. Mabye not as great as other servers, but good. The server has been shutdown for months, shortly after V2 the thunder. It was a miserable creation, laggy, unable to log in. Now, The improved lawscape, made from the ground up, has made some extensive improvements(see below). A client has been created for maximum performance. A whole new server engine will make this server lagless, and very customizable. Many Minigames such as full castlewars, ship engagement, and soon, pest control. All suggestions will be considered. All the work done to this server is done by me only. Nobody else has done anything to the server but me. No tutorials either, except mabye for a few of Xerocheez tuts, but thats about it. All the other tuts are shit(that are not client tuts) The base which is uberly modified, is hybridscape, which has been created by Miss SilabSoft.[/center]

NOTE: Before you try going on, the server will only let admins or mods. Otherwise you will get a “members only” error.
Major Improvements made already:

  • Perfect Magic
  • Perfect Mining and smithing.
  • Almost all skills working
  • Quests and Cutscenes
  • Improved shop system
  • Improved Player Handler
  • Improved Npc Handler
  • Improved Ban handler
  • Whole new server engine, supports lawscape and mopar clients.
  • No lag
  • Friends list fixed for Moparscape, and Lawscape client.
  • New Religion skill.
  • Prayer totally uberfied
  • Fletching exactly like runescape
  • Combat fighting Improved
  • Bank PINS
  • Hell and Heaven
  • Music
  • Clan interface
  • Most (If not all) bugs fixed
  • Webclient (http://lawscape.no-ip.org/playlawscape.html)
  • Economy

Major Improvements being made:

  • Many more minigames
  • Cracking cache
  • Editing cache
  • Repacking cache
  • Whole new client engine
  • Player suggestions quota to be filled
  • All skills working

[center]Many many more updates will be made to this server, and client. The only bad thing is… You got to wait so long! I know, I’m a slow Java programmer. I like to make everything PERFECT.[/center]
